examples.korean: If you reveal your secrets to the wind you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees. (Kahlil Gibran) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만일 바람에게 비밀을 털어놓았다면 바람이 그것을 나무에게 털어 놓는다고 원망해서는 안 된다. (칼릴 지브란, 언어명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If you reveal your secrets to the wind you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees. (Kahlil Gibran) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity. (Ralph Waldo Emerson) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 위대한 사람은 기회가 없다고 원망하지 않는다. (랄프 왈도 에머슨, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity. (Ralph Waldo Emerson) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was a time when my supervising manager asked me to fix a scheduling problem and I did not realize that a few people that were directly related to the situation saw me as the bad guy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저희 상사가 일정 문제를 해결하라고 했는데 저는 그 일정과 직접적으로 관련된 사람들이 저를 원망하고 있다는 사실을 몰랐습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: There was a time when my supervising manager asked me to fix a scheduling problem and I did not realize that a few people that were directly related to the situation saw me as the bad guy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life. (Joan Lunden) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 분노, 원망, 상처를 붙잡고 있으면 근육통과 두통이 생기고, 이를 악물어 턱이 아프다. 용서는 당신의 삶에 웃음과 후련함을 돌려준다. (조앤 런든, 자기관리명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life. (Joan Lunden) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She blamed her mother for her trouble. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신의 고통에 대해 어머니를 원망했다. Neungyule
examples.english: She blamed her mother for her trouble. Add to Wordbook
